item.title: Best Games Centered Around A Road Trip
item.description:
Summary

  • Classic road trip games like Jalopy and Keep Driving offer unique, immersive experiences.
  • Narrative-driven games like Death Road To Canada and Darkest Dungeon 2 bring adventure and replay value.
  • Games like Pacific Drive and Kentucky Route Zero offer atmospheric journeys with supernatural elements and deep storytelling.

Games can take on many forms and structures, but there's something quite succinct about a good journey. And there are few ways to structure a journey that are more natural than a classic road trip. Be it through environments of the urban or fantastical variety, a road trip often offers an immediately meaningful framework.

These games all work around a journey (or multiple journeys) from point A to point B, predominantly through vehicular travel. From the surreal travels of Kentucky Route Zero to the procedural styling of Road 96 , there's something here for all kinds of player.

1 Jalopy

A Simple But Immersive Journey

Jalopy
Driving
Simulation
Systems
Released
March 28, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Minskworks
Publisher(s)
Excalibur Games
Platform(s)
PC, Xbox One
Powered by

Jalopy is a pure road trip experience that tasks players with upgrading, repairing, and generally maintaining a dilapidated vehicle across miles of a minimalist but serene landscape. The gameplay is fairly simple but detailed, offering a driving simulator that's more about the journey than the destination.

It's a quirky experience, but Jalopy may appeal to fans of both driving simulators and atmospheric games. Players can even choose their own route along the long open roads, allowing for a little expression throughout this scenic road trip.

2 Death Stranding

A Combination Of Arduous Hiking & Vehicular Travel

Death Stranding
4 /10
25
7.7 /10
Released
November 8, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Developer(s)
Kojima Productions
Publisher(s)
Sony, 505 Games
Platform(s)
iOS, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

While players aren't always using vehicles in Death Stranding , this immersive title is all about the journey. In addition, players can use multiple vehicles to assist them on their many treks across Death Stranding's often dangerous landscape.

The slow and methodical exploration may be tedious for some, but Death Stranding presents players with frequent road trips that are as rewarding as they are arduous. For players that don't mind a great deal of hiking, Death Stranding is likely to be a worthwhile journey.

3 Road 96

A Replayable Road Trip

Road 96
6 /10
10.0 /10
Released
August 16, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

Developer(s)
DigixArt
Publisher(s)
Plug In Digital
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

This story-driven road trip is an immediately vibrant and stylish title, boasting plenty of bold landscapes and scenic highways. Its gameplay promises a procedurally generated road trip, offering opportunities for discovery that allude to a more personal experience.

Despite being a narrative-driven experience, Road 96 is able to offer replay value via its procedural generation. For fans of narrative experiences that don't mind more experimental games, Road 96 might be worth a shot.

4 Keep Driving

A Charming Road Trip Simulator

Keep Driving
Adventure
RPG
Systems
Developer(s)
YCJY Games

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
10 /10

Publisher(s)
YCJY Games
Platform(s)
PC
Powered by

Focusing on atmosphere while still featuring detailed game mechanics, Keep Driving is a hard left turn from YCJY's last release, the frantic FPS Post Void . Keep Driving is a relaxed game that combines thematic gameplay, inventory management, and RPG elements.

It promises a nostalgic experience that champions freedom and atmosphere above all else, and it may appeal to a very specific niche of players. For fans of road trip experiences, though, Keep Driving is likely to please, sporting inspirations from games such as FTL and Jalopy .

5 Death Road To Canada

An Arcade Journey Through The Apocalypse

Death Road To Canada
7.0 /10
Released
July 21, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Rocketcat Games
Publisher(s)
Rocketcat Games
Platform(s)
PS4, PC, Xbox One, Switch
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Death Road To Canada takes the gameplay loop of games such as The Oregon Trail and combines it with arcade action. In addition, Death Road To Canada features a roguelike structure and a zombie apocalypse setting that frequently throws hordes of undead at the player.

Death Road To Canada tasks players with managing a small rag-tag party of survivors through the apocalypse on a road trip to a potential safe haven. The arcade gameplay is both intuitive and tense, and the replay value provided by its roguelike systems allows for hours of play. Furthermore, the game features local co-op, where it arguably excels.

6 Darkest Dungeon 2

A Dark-Fantasy Roguelike Road Trip

Darkest Dungeon 2
Roguelike
RPG
Systems
Released
May 8, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Red Hook Studios
Publisher(s)
Red Hook Studios
Platform(s)
PC
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Darkest Dungeon 2 is in many ways similar to its predecessor, particularly in its combat and classes, offering an experience that's familiar but far from identical. One notable change is the removal of the town management layer that was so prominent in the original game, replaced by a new road trip structure.

In the game, players assemble a group of four adventurers on a road trip through a burning fantasy world overrun by horrors. Some players may find tedium in the drive from one point of interest to the next, especially as driving the wagon requires little focus or input. However, it brings with it a certain atmosphere and momentum that is sure to appeal to certain players.

7 Pacific Drive

Road Tripping Through Supernatural Landscapes

Pacific Drive
8.5 /10
Released
February 22, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Ironwood Studios
Publisher(s)
Kepler Interactive
Platform(s)
PC, PS5
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Fans of atmospheric driving games and supernatural settings are sure to get a kick out of Pacific Drive . In this immersive exploration game, players venture out on expeditions with a customizable station wagon, attempting to maintain it on dangerous roads rife with supernatural hazards.

The gameplay loop, reminiscent of extraction shooters, tasks players with scavenging environments up until the last possible moment before returning in a hurling blitz back to base. This base is a tremendously cozy garage, where players can perform customization and upgrade their vehicle. It's satisfying, addictive, and atmospheric, offering repeatable road trips that vary in length.

8 Kentucky Route Zero

A Deeply Atmospheric Narrative Road Trip

Kentucky Route Zero
10.0 /10
Released
January 7, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Developer(s)
Cardboard Computer
Publisher(s)
Annapurna Interactive
Platform(s)
PC, PS4, Switch, Xbox One
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Kentucky Route Zero is an immersive but experimental game that's essentially interactive fiction. For fans of games that focus on narrative and atmosphere, it's likely to please, but those that like a little more gameplay in their digital road trips may be disappointed.

This utterly memorable adventure is bolstered, however, by truly evocative and emotional writing, cinematic visuals, and a poignant soundtrack. Tragedy, hope, and heart are all on the table in this magical-realist adventure, providing an unforgettable road trip through a surrealist interpretation of Kentucky.

item.title: Where to Find Irradiated Slag in Dune: Awakening
item.description:
Among the many different crafting materials and components in Dune: Awakening , Irradiated Slag is among the riskiest ones to get in Hagga Basin. However, the threat here isn't from NPCs or other players (to an extent). Instead, it comes from the environment itself.

Irradiated Slag is needed for a number of crafting recipes for Dune: Awakening's endgame, and to get it, players will need to brave the irradiated southwest side of Hagga Basin. There's a limit to how long one can stay here, so make sure to come thoroughly prepared.

Where to Get Irradiated Slag in Dune: Awakening

Irradiated Slag can be found inside wrecked ships scattered across Sheol , the southwestern portion of Hagga Basin that is completely covered in lethal radiation. Players who come to this zone without proper protection won't have long before they turn into a bag of loot, so before you even think of going there, you'll need a couple of things:

Radiation Suit

The Radiation Suit Mk4 is the first piece of anti-radiation players can get in Dune: Awakening . After you unlock its crafting recipe in the Research menu, you'll need the following materials to build one at a Garment Fabricator:

  • 35 Aluminum Ingot
  • 21 Plasteel Microflora Fiber
  • 25 Silicone Blocks
  • 340 Water

Aluminum ore can be mined in the Eastern Shield Wall region, while Plasteel Microflora Fiber can be found in the many Shipwrecks across Arrakis. Silicone Blocks, on the other hand, must be crafted at Refineries using Flour Sand.

The Radiation Suit Mk4 won't make you immune to radiation. Instead, it will greatly increase your resistance to radiation. Combine this with Iodine Pills (crafted from Agave Seeds, Water, and a Duraluminum Ingot) to significantly extend the time you spend in Sheol.

Vehicles

At this point in the game, you should already have an Ornithopter ready. Not only are they great for covering the vast distance needed to reach Sheol, but they can help you escape quickly too, in case the radiation becomes too much for you to handle.

Alternatively, you can get a Sandbike with an upgraded engine. You can reach Sheol through the western side of the map with a sufficiently speedy Sandbike, but this is still incredibly risky. Sheol is surrounded by wide swathes of open sand, and you risk getting the attention of sandworms by driving over them. No one can outrun Shai-Halud

Irradiated Slag Locations

Much like Plastic Microflora Fiber, you can get Irradiated Slag by looting chests in Shipwrecks (except the latter crafting component is exclusive to Sheol). There are six Shipwrecks in Sheol , and the largest one being the Wreck of the Delphis, which is right in the middle of the area. All of these should have chests with Irradiated Slag in them.

Dune: Awakening
14
9.6 /10
Released
June 10, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Funcom
Publisher(s)
Funcom
Engine
Unreal Engine 5
Franchise
Dune
PC Release Date
June 10, 2025
Platform(s)
PC
Powered by

item.title: Lies of P (& Overture) Trophy and Achievement Guide
item.description:
Like most games in the modern soulslike genre, both the base version of Lies of P , and the massive Overture DLC, feature a long list of difficult trophies/achievements for players to master and unlock. Those players looking for the game's ultimate challenge need look no further than this list. And though challenging they surely are, for fans of the game, there is very little that can rival the sense of accomplishment that accompanies the notification confirming the list's completion. In this guide, we'll walk you through each step, showing you how to unlock every trophy or achievement in both Lies of P and the Overture DLC .

How to Unlock All Trophies/Achievements in Lies of P & Overture DLC

When you download the Lies of P Overture DLC, the trophies/achievements are mixed together into one long list. This list will total 53 trophies/achievements in all.

To unlock every achievement/trophy in Lies of P, you'll need to complete at least two playthroughs. While there are three endgame trophies, two of them can be achieved together.

All Trophies/Achievements in Lies of P:

Trophy/Achievement Name

Unlock Requirements

Special Notes

Fatal Blow

Deliver a successful Fatal Attack.

You should accomplish this during the opening moments of the game, as you make your way through the station. The Fatal Attack is a backstab technique that kills an enemy.

Stargazer's Guide

Repair a Stargazer.

You'll complete this as soon as you exit the station and reach the game's first Stargazer. You must repair it to use it.

The Ultimate Defense Technique

Destroy an enemy's weapon with a perfect guard.

A Perfect Guard will damage most basic enemies' weapons. If you perform several Perfect Guards in a row, the weapon will break.

Parade Master

Kill the Parade Master.

Defeat the Parade Master, the first boss in Lies of P.

First Lie

Tell a lie in front of the Hotel Krat entrance.

This is explained by Sophia when you first reach Hotel Krat after defeating the Parade Master.

The Bastards and the Sweepers

Kill a Stalker.

This will unlock when you defeat the Mad Donkey, the first Stalker you encounter. Some players note that finishing this boss with Fatal Blow has caused the trophy/achievement to remain unlocked. While it appears this bug has been patched out, you may wish to avoid Fatal Blows.

Exploring Possibilities

Try to assemble a weapon.

Use the 'Assemble Weapon' system at a Stargazer.

Scrapped Watchman

Kill the Scrapped Watchman.

This will unlock automatically after defeating the Scrapped Watchman boss at Krat City Hall.

King's Flame

Kill King's Flame, Fuoco.

Defeat King's Flame, Fuoco at Venigni Works.

Fallen Archbishop

Kill the Fallen Archbishop Andreus.

Defeat the Fallen Archbishop Andreus at St. Frangelico Cathedral.

The Delayed Match

Defeat the Eldest of the Black Rabbit Brotherhood.

Defeat the Eldest of the Black Rabbit Brotherhood the first time you encounter him.

Bear Gold Coin Fruit

Harvest Gold Coin Fruit

After defeating the Eldest of the Black Rabbit Brotherhood in Chapter 5, you'll unlock access to the Gold Coin Fruit Tree . The first time you harvest fruit from the tree, you'll unlock this trophy/achievement.

King of Puppets

Kill Romeo, King of Puppets

Defeat the King of Puppets at the Estella Opera House.

From Across the Rift

Kill All Types of Dimensional Butterflies

There are three types of Dimensional Butterflies in Lies of P : Red, Pink, and Orange/Yellow. When you enter an area where a butterfly is located, the light will change colors to match the butterfly. They are found throughout the game.

The Champion of Evolution

Kill Champion Victor

Defeat Champion Victor at the Grand Exhibition Gallery.

Extreme Potential

Activate the P-Organ to Phase 5.

Use Quartz to upgrade the P-Organ all the way to the final phase. The P-Organ upgrade chair is located in Geppetto's office, and on the first floor of Eventide Hotel Krat in Overture.

Strongest Legion Arm

Modify the Legion Arm to its max level.

Collect and use Legion Calibers to upgrade any Legion Arm in Lies of P to the highest level. You'll find the device near Venigni in Hotel Krat.

Puppet-Devouring Green Monster

Kill the Puppet-Devouring Green Monster

Defeat the Puppet-Devouring Green Monster at the end of Chapter 7.

Legion Arm Collector

Collect all Legion Arms

Collect every Legion Plug and unlock all Legion Arms at the device near Venigni in Krat Hotel.

Corrupted Parade Master

Kill the Corrupted Parade Master

Defeat the Corrupted Parade Master in Cersani Alley.

Strongest Special Weapon

Strengthen a special weapon to its max level

Once you've visited Alidoro, and traded any special ergo for a Special Weapon, fully upgrade it at Hotel Krat.

Strongest Normal Weapon

Strengthen a normal weapon to its max level.

Upgrade any of the game's normal weapons (can be disassembled) to their max level.

Revenge of Black

Kill the Black Rabbit Brotherhood

Defeat all members of the Black Rabbit Brotherhood in the second encounter with the group.

The Story of a Stranger Girl

Find out about the last story of Eugenie.

Fully complete the side quest between Alidoro and Eugenie.

End of Riddles

Discover all Trinity Sanctums

Answer all telephone riddles to collect all Trinity Keys. Take them to each of the sanctums to unlock this trophy/achievement.

The Story of the Prince

Find out about the last story of Venigni.

In the final Trinity Sanctum, you'll meet Arlecchino. Completely exhaust all of their dialogue options. Collect the "Scandal! V, the Tragedy behind the Flamboyance" lore scrap from the bathroom in Lorenzini Arcade. Read each page of the document, then return to Arlecchino. A new dialogue option should be available. Afterward, they will give you the "Moon World Warrior Toy." Return this to Venigni and exhaust the dialogue to unlock the trophy/achievement.

The Complete One

Kill Laxasia the Complete

Defeat Laxasia at Ascension Bridge.

The Story of the Refined Old Lady

Find out about the last story of Antonia.

Complete Lady Antonia's side quest.

Learning about Emotions

Learn all Gestures

Learn all 17 gestures in Lies of P.

The Awakened God

Kill the Awakened God Simon Manus

Defeat the Awakened God Simon Manus boss, the final non-optional boss of Lies of P.

The Story of the One Who Dreamed

Find out about the last story of Simon Manus.

You will automatically receive this trophy/achievement after defeating Simon Manus and speaking to him. He will ask you about how you handled Sophia. Whether you lie or tell the truth, you'll still get the trophy/achievement.

The First Puppet

Kill the Nameless Puppet

When you meet Gepetto at the end of the game, do not give him your heart. This will automatically begin the fight with the Nameless Puppet. Kill the boss to earn the trophy/achievement.

Veteran Explorer

Decipher all cryptic vessels and claim the rewards.

You must collect all five cryptic vessels in Lies of P, have Venigni decipher them, then locate the reward caches. Players get hung up on the Mechanical Vessel, as they do not have Frozen Feast. You must use the Ergo you collect from Champion Victor to get this weapon. Without it, you cannot get this trophy/achievement.

Normal Weapons Collector

Collect all normal weapons.

You must collect all the basic weapons in the game.

Special Weapons Collector

Collect all special weapons.

You must collect all Special Weapons in Lies of P.

Pianist of Krat

Play a perfect tune on the piano at Hotel Krat

After you've completed the game, do not start a NG+ cycle. Instead, return to Hotel Krat and play the piano. Once this is complete, you can start NG+. This will unlock the trophy/achievement.

Golden Melody

Collect and play all records.

Collect and play every record in Lies of P.

The Story of the Blue Butterfly

Find out about the last story of Sophia.

To get this trophy/achievement, you must choose to give Sophia peace when you meet her. Next, do not start NG+ after completing the game. Some players claim you must choose the "Rise of P" ending and have high humanity. Return to Hotel Krat and collect "The Blue Butterfly's Letter" from Geppetto's desk. Open the letter in the inventory and read each page.

Rise of P

Reach the ending.

To get Rise of P, you must not give Geppetto your heart, then defeat the Nameless Puppet. You can achieve the Rise of P and Free From the Puppet String in the same playthrough.

Free From the Puppet String

Reach the ending

To get Free From the Puppet String, you must keep your humanity level below 8 when you reach Sophia. Choose to let Sophia live in this playthrough to ensure the best result. Fight the Nameless Puppet after refusing to give Geppetto your heart.

Real Boy: They All Lived Happily Ever After

Reach the ending

Give Geppetto your heart.

The Story of One Father

Find out about the last story of Geppetto

After the Real Boy ending, do not start NG+. Return to Hotel Krat and read the letter on Geppetto's desk.

Lies of P

Obtain all trophies

The Platinum trophy on PlayStation.

Lies of P Overture:

True Combat Gear Collector

Collect all weapons and Legion Arms in the Forgotten Time.

Collect every weapon and Legion Arm in Lies of P Overture.

Tracker of Dark Secrets

Decrypt all clues hidden inside the cipher machines and claim the rewards

Collect every cipher machine in Overture , take them to Alidoro at Eventide Hotel Krat to be deciphered, then solve the images.

To be Human

Learn all gestures from the Forgotten Time

There are several gestures you will learn during your time with Overture. Collect them all to unlock this Trophy/Achievement.

Memory's Melodies

Collect and listen to all records from the Forgotten Time.

Most records are easy to find. The two that can be easily missed are from Goddard, the Blind Painter make sure to lie to her, and lie to Alidoro at the end of his quest.

Beyond Limitless Potential

Further upgrade the abilities of the P-Organ

Use the new upgrade mechanic for the P-Organ in Overture.

Puppeteer of Death

Defeat Markiona, the Puppeteer of Death

Defeat the first major boss of Overture.

Anguished Guardian

Kill the Anguished Guardian of the Ruins

Defeat the Anguished Guardian boss.

Honor and Revenge

Kill the Leader of the Bastards and the leader of the Sweepers.

Kill Veronique and Lumacchio. They are both mandatory, and cannot be missed.

The Blood Artist

Kill the Blood Artist

Defeat the final boss in Overture.

The Rose's Memory

Reach the ending

N/A

Enduring Resolve

Listen to the Legend's last recording.

At the end of the game, make sure to listen to the Legendary Stalker's last recorded message.

This list is presented in the exact order that we unlocked them. However, many of them can be unlocked far earlier in the game.

This marks the end of the complete list of all 53 Trophies/Achievements in Lies of P and the Overture DLC.

5 Images

item.title: 8 Best First-Person Co-Op Games On Switch, Ranked
item.description:
The Switch was popular from the drop in 2017, and not just because of the allure of a new system. It actually had a system-selling game that people still enjoy playing and will probably be jazzed about playing on the Switch 2, aka The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild .

Thanks to that game and many others, the Switch quickly became a popular system for many developers to create and port their content to. One thing that the Switch didnt really become known for, though, was first-person games. There are a few, and some even have multiplayer, so lets go through and rank the best ones according to options, how well they run on Switch, and their overall quality.

8 GoldenEye 007

A N64 Classic Returns

GoldenEye 007
7 /10
9.1 /10
Released
August 25, 1997

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Animated Blood, Animated Violence
Developer(s)
Rare
Platform(s)
N64, Xbox One
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Four Players Online

GoldenEye 007 was a multiplayer dream when it came out on the N64 as a masterclass lesson in how to create a good Bond game. The single-player was good too as a faithful adaptation of the movie with expanded scenes, but multiplayer is what drove this into a slumber party classic in the 90s.

The Switch version is free to those who have Nintendo Online and the N64 library, where they can engage with up to four people in matches. Admittedly, its not as good as it used to be, but nostalgia is a powerful thing.

7 Wolfenstein: Youngblood

Fighting Nazis With Body Armor

Wolfenstein: Youngblood
6.7 /10
Released
July 26, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Game Experience May Change During Online Play, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Developer(s)
MachineGames, Arkane Studios
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Stadia
OpenCritic Rating
Fair
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Two Players Online

Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the last major game in the series, for now, which starred B.J. Blazkowiczs teenage daughters, Jessie and Zofia, who got power armor to fight against the Nazis.

While it can be played in single-player, the game is best experienced in co-op with both sisters at play, bouncing quips off each other like a night at an improv scene. The Switch version chugs a bit but it is serviceable to enjoy a bizarre story and some solid Nazi killing action with some inventive weapons.

6 Prodeus

A 90s Throwback

Prodeus
10.0 /10
Released
September 23, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature // Blood and Gore, Violence
Developer(s)
Bounding Box Software
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Four Players Online

Prodeus is a throwback to the old-school Wolfenstein and Doom games with pixel art not seen in a shooter since the 90s PC days. Up to four players can join in on the fun during the campaign, which is rare to see in a retro throwback like this.

Compared to the more AAA budget games , Prodeus worked on a lower scale, meaning that it didnt have to use a lot of the Switchs power to look good online and offline, which helps it stand out.

5 Overwatch 2

Slowly Turning Into Fortnite

Overwatch 2
6 /10
58
7.3 /10
Released
August 10, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Blood, Mild Language, Use of Tobacco, Violence
Developer(s)
Blizzard
Platform(s)
PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Switch, Xbox One S, Xbox One X, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Various Modes

Overwatch 2 has kind of become Fortnite with its recent run of skins, including a collaboration with Street Fighter 6 . That said, the Overwatch series has always prided itself on coming up with cool new skins to reward players and keep them coming back.

It is a free-to-play game after all, and theres no better way to incentivize players than with custom threads. Thanks to the stylized art design, Overwatch 2 looks and runs pretty well online with the main mode featuring five versus five teams, but there are plenty of other modes to dive into, too.

4 Payday 2

Rob Banks For Days

Payday 2
8.3 /10
Released
August 13, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes
Developer(s)
Overkill Software
Platform(s)
Xbox One, Xbox 360, PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Four Players Online

What Payday 2 lacks in skins, it more than makes up for in its central heist mode. Even Grand Theft Auto Online has not reached the heights of robbing banks and shooting at cops online. Players can experience it with four friends or strangers online, and even though its not as good as other consoles, the Switch version is a viable option. The controls may take some getting used to, but such is the life of a thief: trial and error.

3 Dying Light: Definitive Edition

A Parkour Apocalypse

Dying Light: Definitive Edition
10.0 /10
Released
October 19, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
m
Developer(s)
Techland
Platform(s)
PC, Switch, Xbox One, PS4
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Four Players Online

Dying Light: Definitive Edition is a brutal game that emphasizes parkour and melee combat compared to the gunplay of other first-person games. These zombie mutants will not wander around like old men, akin to the Resident Evil games.

They are hungry and want to kill, be it with their teeth or bare hands. Thats why the four-player online option is the best way to experience the campaign, as it makes things easier but still pretty intense.

2 Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection

Play It Your Way

Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection
Shooter
Systems
Released
March 14, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Violence
Developer(s)
Aspyr
Platform(s)
PC, PS4, PS5, Switch, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Weak
Powered by
  • Multiplayer: Various Modes

Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection contains the first two games that came to a Nintendo console for the first time in 2024 after debuting on the PS2 and Xbox. Players can go through the campaigns in two-player split-screen, or they can go into big matches for a 32v32 online game.

The big battles are fun, but playing with just one friend through the campaigns is what helped these two games become legendary. The collection doesnt add a lot to the games, and they dont look as good as modern shooters, but thats just how good these Star Wars games are, be it in third-person or first-person.

1 Borderlands Legendary Collection

Three Games To Loot

  • Developer: Gearbox
  • Publisher: 2K
  • Released: May 29, 2020
  • Platforms: PS4, Xbox One, Switch
  • Games: Borderlands, Borderlands 2, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
  • Multiplayer: Two Players Local/Four Online

Borderlands Legendary Collection is a package deal often on sale on Switch, which contains Borderlands, Borderlands 2, and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel . All three Borderlands games support two players locally for split-screen co-op and four players online.

Borderlands 3: Ultimate Edition would be a good recommendation too, but because its such a bigger game, it only supports two players online for Switch owners. Thats why this collection is the best bang for anyones buck, with plenty of co-op first-person action and loot for days.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Leaked Footage Teases Cinematic Destructive Moments
item.description:
New Battlefield 6 footage has been leaked, teasing some of the game's cinematic and destructive moments from the single-player campaign. Leaks for Battlefield 6 suggest that the game will have multiple modes, including the signature multiplayer experience that Battlefield fans have some to know and enjoy for many years now.

Although Battlefield 6 has not been officially revealed, its status as an upcoming game by EA and the developers at Battlefield Studios is far from being a secret. Introduced in February 2025, the Battlefield Labs program lets players test out features and content that will make its way into Battlefield 6 , and more players have been joining the program under a non-disclosure agreement (NDA), thanks to recent waves of Battlefield Labs invites. However, NDAs haven't stopped some players from leaking information and footage for Battlefield 6 as development continues.

As reported by RockPaperShotgun, new footage of Battlefield 6 was leaked by dataminer temporyal on Twitter, highlighting a short clip from what appears to be the game's single-player campaign with a cinematic and destructive moment. The footage shows the finale of a mission where the final objective involves destroying a dam in Tajikistan. The footage shows the player escaping from the dam at the last minute as it collapses, while bomber jets unleash a payload within the vicinity. Since the mission is a work-in-progress, there's no sound, but the explosive effects that Battlefield fans can expect are intact.

New Battlefield 6 Leaked Footage Shows Cinematic and Destructive Moments from the Single-Player Campaign

It should be noted that the leaked Battlefield 6 footage is not a final representation of the game's campaign, as content can change drastically before the game's launch. There are unfinished elements of the mission present within the footage, including greybox geometry, placeholder props, unfinished animations, and other indicators to show that development is still in progress. However, the footage does show off the game's destruction elements and scale, and datamines appear to show that there will be missing taking place in the US, Egypt, and Gibraltar as well.

Recent leaks have also suggested that Battlefield 6 could have a new battle royale mode. The new battle royale mode will supposedly have many similarities with Activision's ever-popular Call of Duty: Warzone, including supply drops and mission-based rewards. In addition, a feature called the "Oversight System" allows dead players to take control of drones, turrets, and cameras to help their surviving squad mates. If the leaks are accurate, then the battle royale mode could be one of the key highlights of the Battlefield 6 reveal this summer. Afterward, the new Battlefield game is expected to launch within EA's current fiscal year, which runs until March 31, 2026.
